data.text: @ugdsb Extremely disappointing that this has become a political decision over science . The head of sick kids has spoken out . The science table has spoken out. My daughter has a text from a kid in her class + just this week who was in class all day. Protect our kids!
@ugdsb Your tweet was quoted in an article by cknw https://t.co/pAC6Ag2lss
@ugdsb Lecce said school boards have the authority to require masks.  So why do you feel you don't have the authority?
